1.author: A sign that used to hang in our laundry room

2.quote: Maybe a good rule in life is never become too important to do your own laundry.
2.author: Barry Sanders

3.quote: We should all do what, in the long run, gives us joy, even if it is only picking grapes or sorting the laundry.
3.author: E. B. White

4.quote: Learn to put your troubles in your pocket, then leave them there when you do your laundry.
4.author: John Avery

6.quote: You know it's time to do the laundry when you dry off with a sneaker.
6.author: Zach Galifianakis

7.quote: There is profundity to explore, but also laundry to do.
7.author: Bruce Feiler

8.quote: An actress once advised me, 'Make sure you do your own laundry - it will keep you honest.'
8.author: Cate Blanchett

9.quote: Give me a laundry list and I'll set it to music.
9.author: Gioachino Rossini

10.quote: The reality is that we do not wash our own laundry - it just gets dirtier.
10.author: Frank Serpico

11.quote: The secret to finding your passion is to bring it to everything you do. (Yes, even doing the laundry!)
11.author: Marie Forleo

12.quote: Raising children, be aware that the piles and piles of laundry will disappear all too soon and that you will, to your surprise, miss them profoundly.
12.author: Thomas S. Monson

13.quote: Always take an extra quarter to the laundry room.
13.author: Wes Smith

14.quote: I think those little laundry detergent capsules are an amazing thing to have.
14.author: Josh Brolin

15.quote: God goes to work with you and does the laundry with you too. There's no place that God is not.
15.author: Wayne Dyer
